resources.string: Five minutes warming movements: jogging and stretching

With this exercise, it is aimed to give the necessary loading to the body with basic movements and to operate each area at maximum level. If you work 3 days a week, you will get maximum efficiency. If you do not have difficulty in doing so, you can increase the set number to 4.
The goal is to increase heart rate and accelerate calorie burning without resting between movements. Each zone of the body is intended to be operated and to be properly losing weight and tightening.

The aim of this exercise is to increase the heart rate and to perform the necessary loading to shape the body in form. By concentrating on the hip and abdominal muscles, tightening is aimed at these areas. Balanced development has also been added to upper body movements.

With this exercise, it is aimed to give the necessary loading to the body with basic movements and to operate each area at maximum level. If you work 3 days a week, you will get maximum efficiency. If you do not have difficulty in doing so, you can increase the set number to 4.
